title: The Border
occurrences: I'm being sent to the new border of Soviet Russia.
I'm not going to war. I'm going to build up a border, keep the peace.
- Is this bridge the national border? - Actually, the creek beneath it is.
A real border has never existed here. For a thousand years...
What, a baron as the commandant of this measly small border station?
The other side of the bridge? Don't you know where the border is?
But your orders were that the whole of the Border River area...
- Yes. You believe in your border. - I believe in Finland.
"Enclosed are the border regulations approved by the Senate of Finland,
From Helsinki. The new border regulations.
- Why, sir? - He's crossing the national border!
Your actions on the border have been miserable. So as of now,
Our German brethren want the eastern border to hold.
Illegal border crossers will be shot without question.
This is the Finnish border. Only Finns and other nationalities
This is the Finnish border. Russians are not welcome.
Chiefs of Staff to Commandant of Border River, Capt. von Munck, stop.
The border is to be kept closed. You have full authority, stop.
I would like to talk to you about the border...
The border! Of course. Here we are. Manning the border.
- The border is in chaos. I would like to... - The border...
and now it's a national border.
If we could come to some agreement about guarding the border...
That is the border between us and those idiots.
A class border. What other kind of a border do we need here?
There is constant movement across the border.
Smugglers behave as if there were no border.
Did I draw the border? No.
We caught this bastard crossing the border.
- It's trade. - Crossing the border to Finland...
- and crossing the border illegally. - Baron, sir...
what the Bolsheviks are doing behind the border?
"By order of the Commandant of the Finnish-Russian border area,
speaking Russian is forbidden in the vicinity of the border."
"It is also forbidden to move around near the border without a pass."
A few Russians did go on their way. And the border is now stronger.
Our task is to strengthen the border between lawfulness and lawlessness.
- Please hold still. - You've created a border for our nation!
What kind of people pass through? Is the border totally closed?
Captain, then you can draw a new border for Finland again.
You can draw a new border. Behind St. Petersburg.
I thought this was Finland's rightful border.
It is your privilege to draw the new border too.
for your distinguished duty in forming the border.
Have you restored order to the border area?
